name: Trade for the Antidote
description:
Submission for 20 Second Game Jam, made in couple of days.

"You have been poisoned! You feel the end coming!"

You have 20 seconds to get and trade things in order to acquire the antidote.

There are multiple ways to success and some items are just useless.

(if you don't like to use the space key to interact, you can also use the Q or E keys)
